The video was published on Facebook on M: 2020, featuring a superimposed red circle highlighting police officers allegedly standing idle beside stone-throwing protesters.
The video has been viewed more than 8: 000 times, indicating its popularity and potential reach.
The misleading Facebook post: s Hindi caption translates to English as: "To those who think that Delhi Police is doing a great job, they should clear their misunderstanding and watch this video of them during the clashes."
